attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review:
This has to be the Worst app I even got
It’s just bad and there is a lot of stuff wrong with it

attributes.title: So bad 🤢🤡🤮🤮
attributes.review: I bought it and all that showed up was an orange 🍊 it kept glitching and it gave me viruses! So bad all there was on my screen was an orange!

attributes.title: UGH SO DISSAPOINTING 🤢🤢
attributes.review: So this app is just absolutely disgusting. my screen just broke because of this app 🤢🤢🤢🤢 I WISH I CAN GIVE 0 STARS FOR THIS APP. I am immediately deleting this app right now. What a USELESS app!! 🥱🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: First they told me to throw my dog out the window and then they said to push my sister odd my balcony. Like who does that?

attributes.title: Terrible app do not suport the pumpkin
attributes.review: Terrible app terrible quality do not want to support the pumpkin on the front i thought this was an app for trumpets

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: it glitches all the time and hacked into my bank account! i would not recommend this trash app.

attributes.title: Literally the worst
attributes.review: Just downloading made my phone crash.

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: The app keeps glitching every time I try to use it. Lots of bugs
